title: [Hot reseach news] What is Twitter， a Social Network or a News Media？
content:
Recording over 15 thousand views in a week, Mr. Haewon Kwak(Advisor: Prof. Sue Moon) 's research is being sited worldwide on Slideshare and Read Write Web.
According Kwak's research, Twitter is not a very social network. After analyzing over 41 million user profiles and 1.47 billion follower/following relationships, only 22% of all connections on Twitter are reciprocal. The large majority (78%) of connections between users on Twitter are one-way relationships.
This research has become an interesting topic on Twitter and is being retweeted by hundreds of people.
